top.subTitle: Create your original card!!!
top.yourOnlyCardTitle: You can create your original card and battle
top.yourOnlyCardSentence: Create card using your own blockchain game's image.
top.sellYourCardTitle: You can sell your original card
top.sellYourCardSentence: The created cards are enable to trade via DAPPS market
top.whatIsDappsSentence: Blockchain game is a game which choose blockchain as database.It has some pros, data permanency(data is not deleted when game service is finished.) and datatransparency(player becomes not necessary to suspect fraud.) etc.
top.strengthSentence: Even if the data is persist after DAPPS service ended, It is no sense without place to use thedata.This game is the place to use image even if some DAPPS service ended,and the platform for creator who sell the card with his own picture.
top.storySentence: Card game is always played in this world. However someday the image of card has disappeared. You conceive to substitute by blockchain image...
top.makeCardSentence: Create card with frame(card whose image has disappeared) and your own images.
top.makeDeckSentence: Make deck which contains 40 cards from a lot of cards.
top.battleSentence: Your favorite character is full of the screen!!!
